original_text:
Adventure Trail
Fate una ricerca epica attraverso la giungla con la slot online Adventure Trail. Questo gioco a cinque rulli, con 30 linee, proviene da Playtech e presenta coccodrilli, idoli di scimmie d’oro e un esploratore.
Una mappa del tesoro ti porta a combinazioni vincenti extra, e i giri gratis prendono il volo quando un idrovolante atterra sui rulli. I rulli potenziati sono in vigore durante i giochi bonus.
Giocate alla slot Adventure Trail online, e se la funzione Fire Blaze respin si attiva, otterrete una serie di giri extra con premi garantiti tra 1x e 2.000x la vostra puntata.
Adventure Trail è disponibile con tre file e cinque bobine. Queste girano su 30 linee di pagamento sempre attive che possono innescare risultati vincenti con almeno tre simboli corrispondenti. Il gioco viene fornito con un ritorno teorico al giocatore del 96,64% e un potenziale di vincita massimo di 2000x moltiplicato per la scommessa vincente.
Una grafica lussureggiante e selvaggia
L’avventura si svolge in una giungla lussureggiante, dove palme e piante esotiche si trovano sulle rive di un fiume. Insieme a una dolce melodia, si sentono scimmie, scimmie e insetti sulla colonna sonora.
Questa deve essere la cornice di una civiltà perduta, mentre una cornice decorativa dorata circonda i mulinelli, e il nostro coraggioso esploratore cerca una favolosa scimmia incastonata in un gioiello. Questo distinto ragazzo in abito da safari ha già messo le mani su un enorme diamante, quindi si sta avvicinando.
Accanto ai simboli delle immagini, la slot machine Adventure Trail ha icone di carte da gioco sui rulli, alcune delle quali presentano più gioielli. Si tratta di un’altra attraente slot della Playtech, sviluppata in collaborazione con lo studio partner Rarestone Gaming.
In termini di design grafico, il gioco contiene tutti gli elementi che rendono una slot a tema avventura. I simboli grafici sono oggetti e cose che possono essere implementati o visti in qualsiasi avventura nella giungla: bussola, mappa, binocolo, coccodrillo, e l’avventuriero che è a testa in giù per raccogliere sei scimmie d’oro – che rappresentano il simbolo bonus che fa scattare il gioco del jackpot Hold and Spin.
Adventure Trail è una Slot Machine molto attente e capace di catturare il meglio del tema grazie a un’eccellente grafica che circonda ogni singolo simbolo. I risultati delle grandi vincite sono contrassegnati da una fanfara appropriata e da un sacco di monete d’oro, mentre i risultati di vincita che coinvolgono i simboli immagine fanno sì che questi salti nella vita. Il gioco fa più che sufficiente per mantenere l’attenzione, e lo intendiamo sia in termini di effetti visivi che di potenziali vincite.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Anche se Rarestone è la società di produzione dietro questo gioco, tutti i pulsanti e i controlli sono disposti secondo lo stile Playtech. La barra dorata sotto il reel-set mantiene ogni singolo pulsante. Il pulsante di rotazione è verde, rotondo e si trova nell’angolo in basso a destra del reel-set. A sinistra c’è il pulsante che fa girare il rocchetto turbo.
L’autoplay è la modalità di gioco che permette ai giocatori di giocare a mani libere. Premendo quel pulsante si apre un’opzione che ha una scala scorrevole con preset di giri automatici. Il minor numero di giri automatici è di cinque e il massimo di 100. C’è anche l’opzione di impostare un arresto dei giri quando la funzione bonus Adventure Trail è stata attivata.
La slot Adventure Trail visualizza l’importo totale della vincita nella finestra che si trova sotto il terzo rullo. A sinistra c’è il pulsante Scommessa Totale dove i giocatori possono scegliere una puntata tra 10 centesimi per la puntata minima e 500,00€ per la massima, con molti importi in mezzo a questi due.
La tabella dei pagamenti è dinamica, il che significa che i giocatori possono visualizzare il simbolo dei pagamenti nel pulsante ‘i’ in base alla scommessa attiva, ed inoltre, i valori del jackpot cambiano in base alla scommessa attiva. Quindi, se si gioca il gioco con 5 sterline e il Grand jackpot si innesca nella funzione Spin and Hold, chiamata anche Fire Blaze in questo gioco, il premio è pari a 10.000 sterline.
Anche se da sola non vale nulla, la mappa ha un certo valore. È il simbolo selvaggio della slot machine Adventure Trail e può sostituire tutti tranne l’aereo e la scimmia. La X segna il punto per gli Spin vincenti quando il simbolo wild si espande su qualsiasi bobina su cui atterra, ma solo se poi completerà una combinazione per voi.
Ogni tre o più simboli di piano scatenano sei giri liberi. Anche se non sono molti giochi bonus, il giro può recuperare se più aerei atterrano contemporaneamente. Ciò che è davvero eccitante è il fatto che durante il round compaiono solo simboli di immagini ad alto rendimento. Questo rende molto più facile far atterrare una sequenza vincente di simboli di valore.
Altre Slot Machine simili
La slot machine Indiana’s Quest di Evoplay Entertainment ha come protagonista un esploratore dall’aspetto familiare mentre va a caccia di tesori aztechi. Il suo cappello Fedora è un simbolo selvaggio, e le monete d’oro aprono un giro bonus gratuito. Attenzione alle bobine di rotolamento e ai moltiplicatori di vincita.
Gioca la slot Epic Adventure di Novomatic e incontra un personaggio molto simile su cinque rulli. Appena due simboli appaiono, con l’esploratore che paga i premi e innesca le rotazioni bonus quando atterra in sette o più posti.

raw_translation.response:
Adventure Trail is a thrilling slot game from Playtech with five reels and 30 lines, set in a lush jungle. The graphics are stunning and the soundtrack is a perfect accompaniment to the adventure. The game features crocodiles, golden monkey idols, and an intrepid explorer searching for treasure.

The treasure map unlocks extra winning combinations, and free spins are triggered when a seaplane lands on the reels. During the bonus games, enhanced reels are in play. If the Fire Blaze respin feature is activated, players can win a series of extra spins with guaranteed prizes ranging from 1x to 2,000x their bet.

Adventure Trail is available with three rows and five reels, spinning on 30 always-active paylines that can trigger winning results with three or more matching symbols. The game has a theoretical return-to-player of 96.64% and a maximum win potential of 2,000x multiplied by the winning bet.

The gameplay is enhanced by various adventure-themed symbols, including a compass, map, binoculars, crocodile, and the brave explorer on a quest to find six golden monkeys that trigger the Hold and Spin jackpot game. The rich graphics and immersive soundscape make for an engaging and exciting experience, with the potential for big payouts.

The game controls and buttons are designed in the familiar Playtech style, with a golden bar below the reels housing each button. The Autoplay feature allows players to play hands-free, with a sliding scale offering preset automatic spins. The Total Bet button allows players to choose a bet between a minimum of 10 cents and a maximum of 500 euros, with numerous denominations available between these amounts.

The Paytable is dynamic, allowing players to see payout values based on the active bet, with changing jackpot values also tied to the bet value. The wild symbol, represented by the map, has the ability to replace all symbols except the airplane and monkey symbols. The X marks the spot for winning spins when the wild symbol expands on any reel it lands on, completing a winning combination.

Three or more airplane symbols trigger six free spins, during which only high-value image symbols appear, increasing the chance of a winning sequence. Other adventure-themed slot games include Indiana's Quest from Evoplay Entertainment and Novomatic's Epic Adventure, both featuring treasure-hunting explorers and plenty of bonuses. Traverse the jungle and uncover the treasures in Adventure Trail – a must-play for seasoned gamblers seeking excitement and big rewards.

raw_translation.response:
Adventure Trail:

Embark on an epic search through the jungle with the online slot game Adventure Trail. Developed by Playtech, this 5-reel, 30-line game features crocodiles, monkey idols made of gold, and an explorer.

A treasure map leads you to extra winning combinations, and free spins take flight when a seaplane lands on the reels. Enhanced reels are in effect during bonus games.

Play the Adventure Trail slot online, and if the Fire Blaze respin feature is activated, you will receive a series of extra spins with guaranteed prizes ranging from 1x to 2,000x your bet.

Adventure Trail is available with three rows and five reels, which spin on 30 always-active paylines that can trigger winning results with at least three matching symbols. The game comes with a theoretical return to player of 96.64% and a maximum win potential of 2000x multiplied by the winning bet.

A lush and wild graphic design

The adventure takes place in a lush jungle, where palm trees and exotic plants line the banks of a river. Along with a sweet melody, monkeys, apes, and insects can be heard on the soundtrack.

This must be the backdrop of a lost civilization, as a decorative golden frame surrounds the reels, and our brave explorer is seeking a fabulous monkey embedded in a gemstone. This distinctive safari-dressed guy has already laid his hands on a huge diamond and is getting closer.

In addition to the image symbols, the Adventure Trail slot machine has playing card icons on the reels, some of which feature more jewels. This is another attractive Playtech slot, developed in partnership with the Rarestone Gaming studio.

In terms of graphic design, the game contains all the elements that make an adventure-themed slot. The graphic symbols are objects and things that can be implemented or seen in any jungle adventure: compass, map, binoculars, crocodile, and the adventurer who is upside down collecting six golden monkeys - which represent the bonus symbol that triggers the Hold and Spin jackpot game.

Adventure Trail is a very attentive slot machine capable of capturing the best of the theme thanks to excellent graphics that surround each individual symbol. Big win results are marked by an appropriate fanfare and lots of gold coins, while winning results involving image symbols make them come to life. The game does more than enough to keep your attention, and we mean it both in terms of visual effects and potential wins.

Functions and symbols of the Slot Machine

Although Rarestone is the production company behind this game, all buttons and controls are arranged in Playtech style. The golden bar below the reel-set holds every single button. The spin button is green, round, and located in the lower right corner of the reel-set. On the left is the button that spins the turbo reel.

Autoplay is the game mode that allows players to play hands-free. Pressing that button opens an option that has a sliding scale with preset automatic spins. The minimum number of automatic spins is five, and the maximum is 100. There is also the option of setting a stop to the spins when the Adventure Trail bonus feature has been triggered.

The Adventure Trail slot displays the total win amount in the window below the third reel. On the left is the Total Bet button where players can choose a bet between 10 cents for the minimum bet and €500.00 for the maximum, with many amounts in between these two.

The paytable is dynamic, meaning that players can view the payment symbols in the 'i' button based on the active bet, and moreover, the jackpot values change based on the active bet. So, if you're playing the game with 5 pounds and the Grand Jackpot triggers in the Spin and Hold function, also called Fire Blaze in this game, the prize is £10,000.

Although it is worth nothing on its own, the map has some value. It is the wild symbol of the Adventure Trail slot machine and can replace everything except the plane and the monkey. The X marks the spot for winning spins when the wild symbol expands on any reel it lands on, but only if it then completes a combination for you.

Every three or more plane symbols trigger six free spins. Although there aren't many bonus games, the spin can redeem itself if more planes land simultaneously. What's really exciting is the fact that during the round, only high-yielding image symbols appear. This makes it much easier to land a winning sequence of valuable symbols.

Other similar slot machines

The Evoplay Entertainment slot machine Indiana's Quest features a familiar-looking explorer on the hunt for Aztec treasures. His Fedora hat is a wild symbol, and gold coins open up a free bonus spin. Watch out for rolling reels and win multipliers.

Play the Novomatic slot Epic Adventure and meet a very similar character on five reels. As soon as two symbols appear, with the explorer paying the prizes and triggering the bonus spins when he lands in seven or more places.

Review: Adventure Trail:

Embark on an epic search through the jungle with the online slot game Adventure Trail. Developed by Playtech, this 5-reel, 30-line game features crocodiles, monkey idols made of gold, and an explorer.

A treasure map leads you to extra winning combinations, and free spins take flight when a seaplane lands on the reels. Enhanced reels are in effect during bonus games.

Play the Adventure Trail slot online, and if the Fire Blaze respin feature is activated, you will receive a series of extra spins with guaranteed prizes ranging from 1x to 2,000x your bet.

Adventure Trail is available with three rows and five reels, which spin on 30 always-active paylines that can trigger winning results with at least three matching symbols. The game comes with a theoretical return to player of 96.64% and a maximum win potential of 2000x multiplied by the winning bet.

A lush and wild graphic design

The adventure takes place in a lush jungle, where palm trees and exotic plants line the banks of a river. Along with a sweet melody, monkeys, apes, and insects can be heard on the soundtrack.

This must be the backdrop of a lost civilization, as a decorative golden frame surrounds the reels, and our brave explorer is seeking a fabulous monkey embedded in a gemstone. This distinctive safari-dressed guy has already laid his hands on a huge diamond and is getting closer.

In addition to the image symbols, the Adventure Trail slot machine has playing card icons on the reels, some of which feature more jewels. This is another attractive Playtech slot, developed in partnership with the Rarestone Gaming studio.

In terms of graphic design, the game contains all the elements that make an adventure-themed slot. The graphic symbols are objects and things that can be implemented or seen in any jungle adventure: compass, map, binoculars, crocodile, and the adventurer who is upside down collecting six golden monkeys - which represent the bonus symbol that triggers the Hold and Spin jackpot game.

Adventure Trail is a very attentive slot machine capable of capturing the best of the theme thanks to excellent graphics that surround each individual symbol. Big win results are marked by an appropriate fanfare and lots of gold coins, while winning results involving image symbols make them come to life. The game does more than enough to keep your attention, and we mean it both in terms of visual effects and potential wins.

Functions and symbols of the Slot Machine

Although Rarestone is the production company behind this game, all buttons and controls are arranged in Playtech style. The golden bar below the reel-set holds every single button. The spin button is green, round, and located in the lower right corner of the reel-set. On the left is the button that spins the turbo reel.

Autoplay is the game mode that allows players to play hands-free. Pressing that button opens an option that has a sliding scale with preset automatic spins. The minimum number of automatic spins is five, and the maximum is 100. There is also the option of setting a stop to the spins when the Adventure Trail bonus feature has been triggered.

The Adventure Trail slot displays the total win amount in the window below the third reel. On the left is the Total Bet button where players can choose a bet between 10 cents for the minimum bet and €500.00 for the maximum, with many amounts in between these two.

The paytable is dynamic, meaning that players can view the payment symbols in the 'i' button based on the active bet, and moreover, the jackpot values change based on the active bet. So, if you're playing the game with 5 pounds and the Grand Jackpot triggers in the Spin and Hold function, also called Fire Blaze in this game, the prize is £10,000.

Although it is worth nothing on its own, the map has some value. It is the wild symbol of the Adventure Trail slot machine and can replace everything except the plane and the monkey. The X marks the spot for winning spins when the wild symbol expands on any reel it lands on, but only if it then completes a combination for you.

Every three or more plane symbols trigger six free spins. Although there aren't many bonus games, the spin can redeem itself if more planes land simultaneously. What's really exciting is the fact that during the round, only high-yielding image symbols appear. This makes it much easier to land a winning sequence of valuable symbols.

Other similar slot machines

The Evoplay Entertainment slot machine Indiana's Quest features a familiar-looking explorer on the hunt for Aztec treasures. His Fedora hat is a wild symbol, and gold coins open up a free bonus spin. Watch out for rolling reels and win multipliers.

Play the Novomatic slot Epic Adventure and meet a very similar character on five reels. As soon as two symbols appear, with the explorer paying the prizes and triggering the bonus spins when he lands in seven or more places.
